job_description:
We’re looking for Senior Data Scientist to join Procore’s Fintech Risk Advisory Team. In this role, you’ll enable Procore to make smarter, more data-driven decisions, and provide prescriptive solutions to some of Construction's largest problems, particularly focused around how data can help contractors operate safer and drive better insurance outcomes. Construction impacts the lives of nearly everyone in the world, and yet it's also one of the world's least explored industries for how data and AI can impact the industry, Procore ahs among the largest digital construction data sets in the world. That's why we're looking for talented Data Scientists to join Procore's journey to revolutionize a historically underserved industry.

As a Senior Data Scientist, you’ll partner with the Fintech department to implement the set of services needed to release AI and data science models capable of working with TB of data. You'll model related features including one time and ongoing automatic model training, deploying, and monitoring models. This position is a great opportunity to use your machine learning, data engineering, AWS cloud service skills to enable machine learning as a service at scale at Procore.

This position reports into the Fintech Director of Actuarial and Data Science and has the opportunity to be located in any of our US offices, or permanently remote within the US or Canada. We’re looking for someone to join us immediately.

What you’ll do:

• Work with Fintech org to develop and deploy reliable and insightful ML models
• Provide technical leadership for efforts around tooling and infrastructure that enable teams to complete and maintain AI/ML projects efficiently
• Partner with cross-departmental teams to understand the business requirements and design user feedback loop to collect user data
• Coach and mentor junior data scientists on the team; lead code reviews, design, and best practices
• Participate in the evolution of Data Science at Procore
• Use gender-neutral language

What we’re looking for:

• 8+ years of hands-on experience developing predictive models and managing the machine learning lifecycle: data preprocessing and feature development, model training and evaluation, deployment,
• MS or Ph.D. degree in Mathematics, Computer Science, or a related field is preferred
• Experience with problem framing across multiple data science and machine learning subdomains, including forecasting, anomaly detection, classification, and regression
• Superior communication skills with the ability to distill rigorous mathematical and statistical concepts such that non-experts may understand
• Demonstrable experience launching NLP and CV solutions
• Demonstrable experience with developing actionable solutions with LLM tools
• Familiarity with AWS cloud infrastructure services and container systems such as Docker or Kubernetes
• Familiarity with Python ML packages, deep learning framework (Pytorch or Tensorflow), and computer vision packages
• Professional experience in software development (software design and development life cycle) preferred

Base Pay Range $185,800-$255,475. Eligible for Bonus Incentive Compensation. Eligible for Equity Compensation. Procore is committed to offering competitive, fair, and commensurate compensation, and has provided an estimated pay range for this role. Actual compensation will be based on a candidate’s job-related skills, experience, education or training, and location.

Perks & Benefits

At Procore, we invest in our employees and provide a full range of benefits and perks to help you grow and thrive. From generous paid time off and healthcare coverage to career enrichment and development programs, learn more details about what we offer and how we empower you to be your best.

About Us

Procore Technologies is building the software that builds the world. We provide cloud-based construction management software that helps clients more efficiently build skyscrapers, hospitals, retail centers, airports, housing complexes, and more. At Procore, we have worked hard to create and maintain a culture where you can own your work and are encouraged and given resources to try new ideas. Check us out on Glassdoor to see what others are saying about working at Procore.

We are an equal-opportunity employer and welcome builders of all backgrounds. We thrive in a diverse, dynamic, and inclusive environment. We do not tolerate discrimination against employees on the basis of age, color, disability, gender, gender identity or expression, marital status, national origin, political affiliation, race, religion, sexual orientation, veteran status, or any other classification protected by law.

If you'd like to stay in touch and be the first to hear about new roles at Procore, join our Talent Community.
